column4: Israel's Super-Pharm in talks to buy Teva Pharm plant: source
column5: TEL AVIV Israel's largest pharmacy chain Super-Pharm (Israel) Ltd is in talks to acquire Teva Pharmaceutical Industries' plant in the coastal city of Ashdod  a source familiar with the matter said on Sunday  confirming media reports.

column4: UPDATE 1-Israel's Super-Pharm in talks to buy Teva Pharm plant -source
column5: TEL AVIV  Dec 24 Israel's largest pharmacy chain Super-Pharm (Israel) Ltd is in talks to acquire Teva Pharmaceutical Industries' plant in the coastal city of Ashdod  a source familiar with the matter said on Sunday  confirming media reports.

column4: Israel's Super-Pharm in talks to buy Teva Pharm plant -media
column5: TEL AVIV  Dec 24 Israel's largest pharmacy chain Super-Pharm (Israel) Ltd is in talks to acquire Teva Pharmaceutical Industries' plant in the coastal city of Ashdod  Israeli media said on Sunday.
